designations.source: A review of the scarce and threatened Hemiptera of Great Britain (Kirby, P.)
designations.source_description: Kirby, P.  UK nature conservation, No. 2.  Published by JNCC, 1992.  Updates relevant information in the RDB Insects (1987) using the old IUCN categories and criteria (pre 1994).
designations.reporting_category: Rare and scarce species (not based on IUCN criteria)
designations.designation_description: Taxa which do not fall within RDB categories but which are none-the-less uncommon in Great Britain and thought to occur in between 31 and 100 10km squares of the National Grid or, for less-well recorded groups between eight and twenty vice-counties. Superseded by Nationally Scarce, and therefore no longer in use.
